participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Hi team :wave: who would be the right person to talk to about the  signature coordinates parsing API? Blend is very interested and is asking if we have any documentation to share or availability to discuss as they have a burning need for handwriting at the moment and want to see if this can solve their need.
We do not have a signature finding api. We have an api that — given a region of a page in which a signature is expected, reports whether a signature is present.
If that suffices for Blend’s need, Lydia and Chetan are good contact points. If they need handwriting and/or signature location, using Microsoft’s OCR is probably feasible
So I suspect that we have something to offer either way. Though it might involve pushing Microsoft ocr to them!

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message: In that latter case Tami might be a good contact point
